doc:
Wendy Padbury https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wendy_Padbury 0 Wendy Padbury (born 7 December 1947) is a British actress who appeared in a number of popular television series, and is best remembered as Zoe Heriot, a companion to Patrick Troughton's Doctor in Doctor Who, from 1968 to 1969. Wendy_Padbury ( born_7_December_1947 ) is a_British_actress who appeared in a_number of popular_television_series , and is_best_remembered as Zoe_Heriot , a_companion to Patrick_Troughton 's_Doctor in Doctor Who , from 1968 to 1969 .
